name: Hanging Piece
description:
Chess game where you only start with the king piece and have to battle waves of enemies by gathering resources and crafting your own pieces.

How to play

  • Click on your own pieces to move them
  • Move on top of resources to pick them up
  • Craft new pieces using the menu on the left
  • Capture the enemy pieces to earn points
  • Earn points by getting your own pawns all the way across the board
  • You lose points for every enemy piece that makes it all the way to your side
  • Beat your own high score
